Reviews.Title: “Trust me... stay at the Marriott instead. One of the worst I've seen.”
Reviews.Author: brunseye
Reviews.Content: carpets nasty annoying water gurgle 247 bathroom hear elevator creaking night blinds broken stereo tape deck beds uncomfortable door doesnt close dilapidated ive stayed toronto stay time business redeeming feature spacious walkin closet trust marriott literally street cleaner cheaper free breakfasts dinners 3 days week comfortable beds amenities kitchen modern appliances maid service day instead week simply comparison im marriott sold id switch hotels glen grove doesnt offer refunds book fyi am princess ive traveled 30 countries including africa backpacker hostel 200night upscale hotel suites
